div.p: SELAGO, in botany : A genus of the angioſpermia order, belonging to the didynamia claſs of plants ; and in the natural method ranking under the 48th order, Aggregatae. The calyx is quinquefid : the tube of the corolla capillary, with the limb nearly equal, and a single ſeed. There are 22 ſpecies.
